TRUSLINK

Our Core Strength

Why Join Us?

We are a fast growing and progressive organization with an entrepreneurial spirit, which offers attractive career opportunities to young graduates as well as experienced professionals. Working with our multinational business partners, you will gain valuable experience, new skills and the opportunity to apply the best in the FMCG industry.

We are looking for motivated and talented young people who can grasp the business challenges, take up multiple responsibilities, think creatively and bring fresh ideas to shape their future career path

We currently do not have any openings. Please check back on this space later

Contact Us

TRUSLINK

We make every brand a leader in its segment through innovation.

TRUSLINK, a leading FMCG distribution and trading company based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. Established in 2018, our company has quickly emerged as a trusted partner and a driving force in the FMCG industry, delivering unparalleled service and value to our esteemed customers.

Our Brands Or Contact us

Sourcing

We specializes in the comprehensive sourcing of products from renowned brands across the globe. With an extensive network and established partnerships, the company diligently procures a wide range of merchandise from top-tier brands originating from various corners of the world. By actively engaging with manufacturers and suppliers, they ensure the availability of sought-after products that meet the highest standards of quality, innovation, and consumer demand. Through their meticulous sourcing process, the company consistently offers a diverse portfolio of global brands, catering to the diverse preferences and needs of their valued customers.

Brands

0

Trusted Partners

Single Source

We offer convenient and comprehensive one-stop-shop service to its customers, eliminating the need for them to engage with multiple suppliers. Understanding the challenges and complexities of managing a diverse product portfolio, the company has strategically built strong partnerships with numerous suppliers and manufacturers across various categories. By leveraging these relationships, they ensure that their customers have access to a wide range of products under one roof, simplifying the procurement process and saving valuable time and effort. From food and beverages to personal care and household essentials, the company’s extensive product catalogue covers all the essential categories, enabling customers to conveniently fulfill their diverse requirements through a single supplier. This integrated approach not only streamlines the purchasing process but also enhances efficiency and reduces operational complexities for their valued customers.

Emplyees

Trusted Partners

Stocking

 We operates a highly efficient system for stocking products in a central warehouse. Recognizing the importance of streamlined inventory management, the company has established a state-of-the-art facility that serves as the central hub for their extensive range of products. The warehouse is strategically designed to accommodate the storage, organization, and distribution of goods from various brands and categories.

With meticulous planning and implementation, the company ensures that the warehouse is optimally structured to maximize space utilization while maintaining product integrity and accessibility. Advanced inventory management systems are employed to track stock levels, monitor expiry dates, and facilitate seamless order fulfillment.

0

Brands

Emplyees

Trusted Partners

Brand Management

We places a strong emphasis on the development and nurturing of brands, striving to elevate them to the position of category leaders. Recognizing the significance of brand value and consumer loyalty, the company invests considerable resources and expertise into each brand they handle. The company’s approach goes beyond mere distribution; they actively collaborate with brands to foster growth and market dominance. This involves implementing targeted marketing campaigns, conducting market research, and analyzing consumer trends to identify opportunities for brand expansion and innovation. Through consistent and tailored marketing efforts, they aim to increase brand awareness, build brand equity, and drive consumer engagement. Moreover, the company prioritizes long-term relationships with their brand partners, recognizing that sustained brand success requires ongoing support and guidance. They provide regular feedback, share market intelligence, and offer strategic advice to ensure brands stay aligned with evolving consumer demands and industry trends.

0

Brands

Emplyees

Trusted Partners

Cash and Carry

Our purpose is to deliver a robust cash and carry management system specifically tailored to meet your needs. Our comprehensive design focuses on providing you with an efficient and effective platform that streamlines the cash and carry operations. With our system in place, you can expect seamless management of your cash and carry business, empowering you with the tools and functionalities necessary for smooth operations. Our system is carefully crafted to handle the intricacies of inventory management, pricing, sales tracking, and customer transactions, ensuring accuracy and reliability. Through our powerful cash and carry management system, you gain access to advanced features that simplify tasks such as stock replenishment, order processing, and real-time sales analysis. By centralizing and automating these processes, we enable you to optimize your operations, minimize errors, and improve overall productivity. Our system is designed with a user-friendly interface, making it intuitive and easy to navigate. We provide comprehensive training and support to ensure that you and your staff can quickly adapt to and utilize the system to its fullest potential.
